metadata.title: CVE-2021-31811 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - low
metadata.description: In Apache PDFBox, a carefully crafted PDF file can trigger anOutOfMemory-Exception while loading the file. This issue affects ApachePDFBox version 2.0.23 and prior 2.0.x versions.

criterions.comment: libpdfbox2-java package in esm-apps/focal is affected and may need fixing.
libpdfbox-java package in esm-apps/focal is affected and may need fixing.
